title: Giving Back the Refreshment
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Eli-saaan~♪ Good afternoon~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Ah, Chika. Welcome.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Would you like some delicious mikan from Numazu~? They’re so sweet and juicy, once you start eating one, you won’t be able to stop~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Thanks, I’ll have some later. Can you leave them over there?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Okaaay~. Ah, do you want me to massage your shoulders? I also brought the thing where if you put it on your eyes, it will make you feel warm and fuzzy. There’s also-....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>....Are you trying to help me refresh by any chance?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eeeh!? How did you know!? Auu~, I guess I just can’t make it seem natural.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, you’re so honest. But I think the part of you that can’t hide anything is good, Chika. Just knowing that you care for me already makes me feel warm and fuzzy.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ehehe~. I guess if you feel that way, then it’s technically a success!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Maybe I’ll have some mikan now. I’m curious now that you say I won’t be able to stop after just one.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Please do~! I’ll peel them for you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
